import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiSearch, FiHeart, FiUser, FiShoppingCart, } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { FaSwimmer, FaTshirt, FaStar } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const VietSilkApp = () => { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [activeDropdown, setActiveDropdown] = useState(null); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [cartCount, setCartCount] = useState(0); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const navigationItems = [ { name: 'Women', items: ['New In', 'Underwear', 'Swimwear', 'Jeans', 'Clothing'] }, { name: 'Men', items: ['New In', 'Underwear', 'Swimwear', 'Jeans', 'Clothing'] }, { name: 'Kids', items: ['New In', 'Babies (0-4 Years)', 'Boys (4-16 Years)', 'Girls (4-16 Years)'] } ]; const fetchProducts = async (gioiTinh) => { setLoading(true); setProducts([]); // reset products trước khi fetch try { const res = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/products?gioiTinh=${gioiTinh}`); if (!res.ok) { const errorData = await res.json(); throw new Error(errorData.message || 'Error fetching products'); } const data = await res.json(); setProducts(data); } catch (error) { console.error("Fetch error:", error); setProducts([]); } setLoading(false); }; const featuredCategories = [ { title: 'Swimwear Now', description: 'Minimalist bikinis and board shorts inspired by your next escape. Feel the heat of summer.', imageSrc: '/images/Men_Hero_Swim_D_Tablet.png', bgColor: 'from-blue-100 to-blue-200', textColor: 'text-blue-400' }, { title: 'The Baselayers', description: 'Defining pieces for under every thing.', icon: , bgColor: 'from-gray-100 to-gray-200', textColor: 'text-gray-400' }, { title: 'New Arrivals', description: 'The just-in styles for the new season. Explore the new classics.', icon: , bgColor: 'from-green-100 to-green-200', textColor: 'text-green-400' } ]; const handleEmailSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (email) { alert('Cảm ơn bạn đã đăng ký nhận tin!'); setEmail(''); } }; return (
